name: Verto FX
description:
Verto provides a transparent, safe, fast and cost-effective marketplace for African businesses to facilitate their foreign exchange needs. By connecting Liquidity providers, FX Brokers, and Payment Institutions, companies can determine their exchange rates at the time that suits them, therefore, providing a constant liquidity flow cheaply. 

In addition, Verto offers faster settlement periods and facilitates onward payments for goods and services.

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
About us :
We are a fintech company backed by YCombinator ,one the world’s best accelerators (Airbnb, Stripe, Dropbox, Coinbase), based in London and are in the very early stages of disrupting the way businesses in developing markets exchange currencies and make international payments.
 
You:
Driven and Ambitious, you are constantly challenging the status quo and are comfortable with ambiguity. Always willing to take on new responsibilities, highly organized and a great aptitude for learning. Creative individual, willing to work in a haphazard start-up environment with excellent communication skills.

About The Internship:
We are looking for one interns for 3 months to join our small but "fierce team" in London 
This is a great opportunity to LEARN: digital marketing, influencer marketing and content creation and more.

Here is what it will cover 
Lead Generation 
Marketing/communications 
Search Engine Optimisation 
Content/ campaign creation 
Event organisation/meetups 
Google and FB ads
Business development 
Blogs 
Competitive analysis and more 

Benefits:
Casual dress
All the latest tech you need
Skip the commute and work from home once a week
Stay refreshed: tea, coffee and beers on tap
Competitive salary

Prior experience needed, if you have got what it takes and interested simply apply.
